name: le_bucket/f3
description: This will be a project in which I learn the F3 microframework enough to be be able to finish my school project. I also have to incorporate other elements such as ( but could change in the future ) APCu chaching, pgbouncer for conneciton pooling and then there is a beautiful bonus that could be to have partial file compression with libraries such as Zstd or l4z. Would be great and fun.
